subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: {{der|zh|sit}}; compare {{cog|lus|hnu||work finished; harvested or weed area}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). {{och-l|農}} may be a derivative ([[ibid.]]).
